oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ Kanz al-mughrimīn / lil-Shaykh al-ʻĀrif billāh Ibn Sabʻīn : manuscript, 1593
Kanz al-mughrimīn
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn Sabʻīn, ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn Ibrāhīm , 1216 or 1217-1270
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Anṣārī, Muḥammad Amīn al-Sabtī al-Alūsī (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ownership statement on fol. 1 signed Muḥammad Amīn al-Sabtī al-Alūsī al-Anṣārī (?).
According to the colophon (f. 81r), copy completed on 4 Rabīʻ al-Thānī 1001 AH [January 7, 1593 AD] in the hand of Zayn al-ʻĀbidīn ibn Muḥammad al-Khaṭīb al-Adhkāwī (?).
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 21 x 15.1 cm. (14.5-16 x 10-10.5 cm.).
Written in several hand, in one column, from 13 to 20 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
The book is preceded by some writings on divination (ff. 1r-14r).
MS Arab 204. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Symbolism of numbers
Islamic occultism
Divination--Islamic countries
Occultism--Religious aspects--Islam
